title: How to get more marks in 12 math, physics, and chemistry - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice, Practice and Practice. To excel in board exams of class 12, you really need a lot of hard work to put in. Never bunk class. If you have joined coaching, no matter what topic they are teaching. Try to be present in class both physically and mentally.Don't be hesitant while asking questions. Nobody is intelligent since birth. We people make mistakes and learn from it. So, whenever you don't get any topic, ask from your teacher.Take the help from internet. There are various platforms where students get their doubts cleared. Youtube is one of them. Watch it and learn it.Read the books throughly specially NCERT. Few questions come directly from it. So, It would become piece of cake for you to answer it if you have already read that.Go through the previous years questions and strive to know the pattern. Arihant Chapterwise could be helpful for you.Stress more on previous year paper than sample paper. Just do 4–5 sample paper to make sure if you're able to complete paper on time or not.Drink lots of water because it will keep your body hydrate enough to learn new things.Don't panic during examtime. Keep telling yourself you are the best.Here is the book which helped me a lot.
by preparing continuously only you can prepare for anything. so do studies on a daily routine and continuously. good day!
